name: 2024 13th International Conference on Frontiers of Intelligent Technology
content: Conference Proceedings: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted paper after successful registration will be published into conference proceedings and indexed by EI Compendex, SCOPUS, and other databased. Journal: Accepted papers after undergoing a preliminary review and rigorous peer review will be published in the Journal of Advances in Information Technology, which will be indexed by ESCI(Web of Science), Scopus, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CNKI, etc.
organizers: University of Macau, China & University of Nantes, France
